column5: During the Leaf game in St. Louis at about the 10 minute mark of the 1st period while they were  "down low" with Ray Ferraro there was a some random guy standing in the background with a white with blue Dunnville Mudcats jersey.
Saw that too, commented to my wife on that.
Ya, I noticed that right away.  How cool is that.  Wonder if that's an ex-Dunnville guy now living in St. Lew or just visiting.  Anyhoo, Leafs won so a great night!
